title: Anything else I can do about a scripter?
body:
I already reported him & chose the 3rd party offense. Afterwards, I spectated his next game & he was doing the same thing (stutter stepping when skillshots were thrown at him, kiting while move/attacking inhumanly, dodging skillshots from FoW).

The reason I ask if there is anything else I can do is because this is at level 7 & I doubt newer players will notice these things (or if they do not realize it's scripts).

I messaged a guy after the game I spectated & informed him about the scripter. He immediately stated he was thinking the same thing the entire game.

replies.body:
Reporting this player in post-game lobby was the best action you could have taken, and it really helps us prioritize who we look at for offenses. I appreciate that you're so passionate about this. Please continue to report players who you suspect are abusing exploits or cheats and we'll take care of the rest.

Let me know if you have any questions.
